about.title: Who I Am
about.description1: I'm a web developer specialized in modern frontend technologies, with experience in creating responsive and high-performance web applications. I work with Next.js, React, and TypeScript to build exceptional user experiences.
about.description2: I believe in the power of user-centered design and always strive to create beautiful and functional interfaces. With my expertise in Tailwind CSS and Shadcn/ui, I develop modern and responsive designs.
about.reactDesc: Specialized in React and Next.js application development with focus on performance and experience
about.typescriptDesc: Experience in TypeScript for writing safer and more maintainable code
about.nodeDesc: Experience in backend development using Node.js and Express
